topic.topicDialog:
Once you have created your Teaching Group and given it a Group Code, your students are ready to login and assign themselves to the group.

The next few screens will show you the students view.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, click on the Join a Teaching Group button.
Enter the Group Code you have been given by your Teacher.
The courses that are assigned to that Teaching Group will then appear on the Home page for the students to access.
